thread.title: 10-year-old boy dies after 'piece of furniture falls on him' at Reading shopping centre
thread.title_full: 10-year-old boy dies after 'piece of furniture falls on him' at Reading shopping centre

author: Patrick Grafton-Green
title: 10-year-old boy dies after 'piece of furniture falls on him' at Reading shopping centre
text:
Monday 13 February 2017 21:34 GMT Click to followThe Evening Standard 
A 10-year-old boy has died after suffering severe head injuries in an incident at a shopping centre. 
The incident happened in the Oracle Centre, Reading, shortly after 4pm this afternoon. 
The boy is believed to have been shopping in Top Shop when a piece of furniture reportedly fell on him. 
Paramedics and Thames Valley Police rushed to the scene and he was taken to hospital, but he was later prounced dead. 
An investigation is underway into what happened, police said. The boy was rushed to hospital after the incident, which reportedly happened in Top Shop 
A spokesman for Thames Valley Police said: “We were called by the South Central Ambulance Service at around 4.15pm this afternoon to a retail store at the Oracle shopping centre, Reading. 
“On attendance we found that a 10-year-old boy had suffered serious head injuries after an incident involving store furniture. Read more
